image.title: Wanted Poster Edit
image.description: Customize a One Piece style bounty poster: replace the character image, change the name, and set a new bounty amount.
image.prompt: Take this One Piece style wanted poster and replace luffy photo with the uploaded image. dont change style uploaded image for character. Change the name text to the [...], and update the bounty amount to $[...]. Keep the classic wanted poster design, font style, and paper texture consistent. Make result 9:16

image.title: Cyberpunk Banana
image.description: Neon-lit cyberpunk style with dramatic rim lighting.
image.prompt: Cyberpunk neon lights, rainy city reflections, dramatic rim light, high contrast

image.title: Viral Figure Object
image.prompt: to create a 1/7 scale commercialized figure of the subject in the illustration,in a realistic style and enviroment. Place the figure on a computer desk, using a circular transparent acrylic base without any text. On the computer screen, display the ZBrush modeling process of the figure. Next to the computer screen, place a BANDAI-style toy packaging box printed with the original artwork.

image.title: Anime Place Style
image.description: Transform any landscape or place into anime-style background art.
image.prompt: Convert this Place into anime background style with clean outlines, painterly sky, vibrant but balanced colors, and smooth cel shading. Preserve perspective, depth, and natural composition while giving it the look of an anime background plate.

text.title: Banana Island
text.description: Whimsical island made of bananas in a turquoise sea.
text.prompt: A whimsical tropical island shaped like a banana, crystal turquoise water, sunny sky, cinematic lighting

text.title: Banana Bot
text.description: Cute robot made from banana shapes, glossy finish.
text.prompt: Cute banana-shaped robot with glossy yellow shell and chrome joints, studio lighting, high detail

text.title: Poster Design
text.description: Minimal poster with bold banana graphic and modern typography.
text.prompt: Minimal poster design featuring a large flat banana graphic, modern sans-serif typography, negative space

text.title: Banana City
text.description: Futuristic city where buildings resemble bananas.
text.prompt: Futuristic cityscape at dusk with skyscrapers subtly shaped like bananas, neon accents, moody atmosphere

text.title: Macro Banana
text.description: Hyper-detailed macro shot of banana texture.
text.prompt: Ultra-detailed macro photograph of banana peel texture with dramatic side lighting

text.title: Banana Spaceship
text.description: Sleek spaceship silhouette inspired by a banana.
text.prompt: Sleek banana-shaped spaceship flying through a starfield, cinematic rim light, volumetric fog
